results.name: Centered 18-gonal numbers.
comment: Equals binomial transform of [1, 18, 18, 0, 0, 0,...]. Example: a(3) = 55 = (1, 2, 1) dot (1, 18, 18) = (1 + 36 + 18). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 24 2010
Narayana transform (A001263) of [1, 18, 0, 0, 0,...]. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 28 2011
link: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to centered polygonal numbers
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
mathematica: FoldList[#1 + #2 &, 1, 18 Range@ 45] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 02 2011 *)
xref: Cf. centered polygonal numbers listed in A069190.
results.author: _Terrel Trotter, Jr._, Apr 07 2002
